Content.Data:
TeamMentor page for: Insufficiently Protected Credentials

Content for CWE ID: 522

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 1526
Cwe : 522
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 1
PackageId : 1282
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList AllPSW = Find_Passwords();

AllPSW = AllPSW - Find_Methods();

CxList AllDB = Find_DB_Methods();
CxList DBOut = Find_DB();

foreach (CxList db in DBOut)
{
	result += AllPSW.InfluencedByAndNotSanitized(db, AllDB - db);	
}
